rate.description: rate is the commission rate charged to delegators, as a fraction.

max_rate.description: max_rate defines the maximum commission rate which validator can ever charge, as a fraction.

max_change_rate.description: max_change_rate defines the maximum daily increase of the validator commission, as a fraction.

CommissionRates.title: Commission Rates
CommissionRates.description: CommissionRates defines the initial commission rates to be used for creating a validator.
